title: Display the name Maniha on the home screen

requirements.text: Add the name "Maniha" to the home screen content so it is visibly displayed to the user while keeping the main heading text exactly "Will you be my bestie forever?".
acceptanceCriteria: On the initial/home screen, the name "Maniha" is displayed in the main content area (not only in metadata like the HTML title).
The main question heading remains exactly: "Will you be my bestie forever?".
All user-facing text remains in English (the name "Maniha" is displayed as provided).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce backend dependencies for displaying the name; this should be a frontend-only text/content change.
nonGoals: Do not change the existing Yes/No button behavior or animations.
Do not change the success screen wording unless required to display the name there (not requested).
Do not revert the main heading back to Valentine-themed phrasing.
